title: Cinéaste: A Fine-grained Contextual Movie Question Answering Benchmark
summary: This paper introduces Cinéaste, a comprehensive benchmark for long-form movie understanding. It addresses the challenge of diagnosing the capacity of vision-language models for deep, narrative comprehension by evaluating fine-grained reasoning over long-form narrative content, filling a gap in existing benchmarks.
